trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> class represents an Active Directory Domain Services forest.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 類別表示 Active Directory 網域服務樹系。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all application partitions in the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得樹系中所有應用程式分割的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartitionCollection" /> object that contains all of the application partitions in this forest.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartitionCollection" /> 物件，其中包含此樹系中的所有應用程式磁碟分割。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立信任之樹系的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 成員，決定相對於這個樹系的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: The password for the trust.
trans-unit.target: 信任的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.
trans-unit.target: 建立與指定樹系之信任關係的本機端。

trans-unit.source: This method creates one side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立信任關係的一方。

trans-unit.source: The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立雙方的信任之前，不會建立信任。

trans-unit.source: The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust.
trans-unit.target: `trustPassword`建立信任與參數產生關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other.
trans-unit.target: 建立信任的另一端時，提供相同的密碼，而且兩個本機信任會接著繫結到彼此。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.CreateTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式建立信任關係的雙方單一方法呼叫中，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.CreateTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The trust relationship already exists.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係已經存在。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForest" /> name or <paramref name="trustPassword" /> string is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForest" /> 名稱或 <paramref name="trustPassword" /> 字串是空的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForest" /> or <paramref name="trustPassword" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForest" /> 或 <paramref name="trustPassword" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="direction" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="direction" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object that represents the forest that the trust is being created with.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件，表示信任建立所在的樹系。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 成員，決定相對於這個樹系的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified forest.
trans-unit.target: 建立與指定樹系之信任關係的兩端。

trans-unit.source: This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法建立信任關係的兩端具有單一方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is used to create only one side of a trust.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法用來建立信任的一側邊。

trans-unit.source: The trust relationship already exists.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係已經存在。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForest" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForest" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="direction" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="direction" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the forest that the trust exists with.
trans-unit.target: 與其存在信任之樹系的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the local side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 刪除信任關係的本機端。

trans-unit.source: When one side of a trust relationship is deleted, the trust is no longer established.
trans-unit.target: 刪除信任關係的一方時，會無法再建立信任。

trans-unit.source: To delete both sides of a trust relationship with one method call, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.DeleteTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除單一方法呼叫的信任關係的兩端，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.DeleteTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> that is specified by the <paramref name="targetForestName" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 和 <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 參數指定的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object that represents the forest that the trust exists with.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件，代表與其存在信任的樹系。

trans-unit.source: Deletes both sides of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 刪除信任關係的雙方。

trans-unit.source: To delete only one side of a trust relationship, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.DeleteLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除的信任關係的只有一個邊，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest.DeleteLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: 和指定的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForest" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForest" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are held by the object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放該物件所持有的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources that are held by the object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放此物件所持有的所有 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines if the managed resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，可決定是否應該釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the managed resources should be released; <see langword="false" /> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該釋出 Managed 資源，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果應該只釋出 Unmanaged 資源，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the managed resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放此物件所使用的 Managed 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all domains in the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得樹系中所有網域的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollection" /> collection that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> domains in the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollection" /> 集合，其中包含目前 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> 網域。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest.
trans-unit.target: 尋找這個樹系中所有可搜尋的通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest.
trans-unit.target: 尋找這個樹系中所有可搜尋的通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" /> that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" />，其中包含已找到的通用類別目錄之集合。

trans-unit.source: You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由查詢 DNS SRV 記錄來尋找可探索的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: Only global catalogs that register a generic, non-site-specific, GC SRV record are returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 只有通用類別目錄註冊泛型、 非特定站台、 GC SRV 記錄是由這個方法傳回。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的網站名稱。

trans-unit.source: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.
trans-unit.target: 在指定網站尋找這個樹系中所有可搜尋的通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" /> that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" />，其中包含已找到的通用類別目錄之集合。

trans-unit.source: You can find discoverable global catalogs by querying DNS SRV records.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由查詢 DNS SRV 記錄來尋找可搜尋的通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: If a global catalog does not register a GC SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the global catalog is physically located within that site.
trans-unit.target: 如果通用類別目錄不會註冊指定的站台的 GC SRV 記錄，它將不會傳回使用這個方法，即使通用類別目錄實際上是位於站台中。

trans-unit.source: All global catalogs which register a GC SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they might not be physically located within that site.
trans-unit.target: 會使用這個方法，傳回登錄指定的站台的 GC SRV 記錄的所有通用類別目錄，即使可能不會實際位在該站台內。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="siteName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="siteName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="siteName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="siteName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds all the global catalogs in this forest.
trans-unit.target: 尋找此樹系中的所有通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: Finds all the global catalogs in this forest.
trans-unit.target: 尋找此樹系中的所有通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" /> that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" />，其中包含已找到的通用類別目錄之集合。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的網站名稱。

trans-unit.source: Finds all the global catalogs in this forest for a given site.
trans-unit.target: 在此樹系中尋找指定網站的所有通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" /> object that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" /> 物件，其中包含已找到的通用類別目錄之集合。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="siteName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="siteName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="siteName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="siteName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds a single global catalog in this forest.
trans-unit.target: 在這個樹系中尋找單一通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: Finds any global catalog in this forest.
trans-unit.target: 在這個樹系中尋找任何通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />。

trans-unit.source: A global catalog cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務產生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions" /> value specifying the location criteria.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置準則的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Finds a global catalog in this forest for a specified location criteria.
trans-unit.target: 在這個樹系中針對指定的位置準則尋找通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> object for the specified location criteria.
trans-unit.target: 指定之位置準則的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A global catalog cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務產生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的網站名稱。

trans-unit.source: Finds a global catalog in this forest for a specified site.
trans-unit.target: 在這個樹系中為指定的網站尋找通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> object for the specified site.
trans-unit.target: 指定之站台的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A global catalog cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="siteName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="siteName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="siteName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="siteName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的網站名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions" /> value that specifies the location criteria.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置準則的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Finds a global catalog in this forest for a specified site and location criteria.
trans-unit.target: 在這個樹系中尋找指定網站和位置準則的通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> object for the specified site and location criteria.
trans-unit.target: 指定之站台和位置準則的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: 找不到通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="siteName" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the operating mode of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得樹系的作業模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode" /> value that represents the current forest mode of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode" /> 值，表示此 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 的目前樹系模式。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the operating mode level of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得樹系的作業模式等級。

trans-unit.source: The operating mode level of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 樹系的作業模式等級。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the trust relationships of the current forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前樹系之信任關係的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformationCollection" /> collection that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformation" /> objects that represents trust relationships of the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformationCollection" /> 集合，其中包含表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformation" /> 的信任關係之 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object for the current user context.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前使用者內容的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object that represents the current forest.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前樹系的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> 物件，包含目標和認證以用來擷取物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之內容的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object that represents the forest that was retrieved by this method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件，表示這個方法所擷取的樹系。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the target that is specified in <paramref name="context" /> could not be made.
trans-unit.target: 無法對 <paramref name="context" /> 中指定之目標建立連線。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> with which the inbound trust relationship exists.
trans-unit.target: 傳入信任關係存在的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 之 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得可指出與指定樹系的連入信任關係是否已啟用選擇性驗證的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用選擇式驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用選擇式驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a forest trust, if you opt for selective authentication, permissions must be manually enabled on each domain and resource in the local forest to which you want users in the other forest to have access.
trans-unit.target: 樹系信任，如果您選擇使用選擇性驗證，則必須在每個網域和您要在其他樹系中的使用者能夠存取本機樹系中的資源上手動啟用權限。

trans-unit.source: When a user authenticates across a trust for which selective authentication is enabled, an Other Organization security ID (SID) is added to the user's authorization data.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的使用者會驗證經由信任時啟用驗證，則其他組織的安全性識別碼 (SID) 加入至使用者的授權資料。

trans-unit.source: The presence of this SID prompts a check on the resource domain to ensure that the user is allowed to authenticate to the particular service.
trans-unit.target: 若出現此 SID，會提示您檢查資源網域，以確定允許使用者驗證特殊服務。

trans-unit.source: After the user is authenticated, the server that authenticates the user adds the This Organization SID if the Other Organization SID is not already present.
trans-unit.target: 使用者經過驗證之後，伺服器會驗證使用者，如果其他組織 SID 還不存在，就會加入此的組織 SID。

trans-unit.source: Only one of these special SIDs can be present in an authenticated user's context.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個特殊的 SID 可出現在已驗證的使用者內容中。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> that is specified by <paramref name="targetForestName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 指定的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 之間沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: The call to LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName failed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName 失敗。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/secmgmt/security/lsaquerytrusteddomaininfobyname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)) 中的＜[LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/secmgmt/security/lsaquerytrusteddomaininfobyname.asp)＞主題。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件已經處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object with which the trust relationship exists.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係存在的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件之 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SID filtering status of a trust.
trans-unit.target: 取得信任的 SID 篩選狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if SID filtering is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用 SID 篩選，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object that is specified by <paramref name="targetForestName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the trust relationship between this forest and the specified forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得此樹系和指定樹系之間的信任關係。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" /> 物件，表示此樹系和指定之樹系之間的信任關係。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all global catalogs in the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得樹系中所有通用類別目錄的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" /> collection that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> global catalogs in the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection" /> 集合，其中包含目前 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 通用類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得此樹系的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the domain controller that holds the FSMO naming master role for the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得持有樹系 FSMO 命名主機角色的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController" /> object that represents the domain controller that is the FSMO naming master of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController" /> 物件，表示此 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 之 FSMO 命名主機的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode" /> enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode" /> 列舉值，可指定此樹系的新作業層級。

trans-unit.source: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.
trans-unit.target: 提高樹系的作業模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode> value can be raised but not lowered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode>值可以引發，但不是會降低。

trans-unit.source: This means that raising the functionality level of the forest is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully.
trans-unit.target: 這表示提高樹系功能等級是無法回復，而且若要這樣做的決策應該小心進行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about forest operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp).
trans-unit.target: 如需樹系的作業模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[網域與樹系功能](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp)。

trans-unit.source: The following table defines the valid values for `forestMode` based on the current operating mode of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 下表定義的有效值`forestMode`根據目前的作業模式的樹系。

trans-unit.source: Current mode
trans-unit.target: 目前的模式

trans-unit.source: Mode can be raised to
trans-unit.target: 模式可引發來

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Based on the current operating mode of the forest, the value specified for <paramref name="forestMode" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 根據此樹系目前的作業模式，為 <paramref name="forestMode" /> 指定的值無效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="forestMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="forestMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Raise to this level.
trans-unit.target: 提高到這個等級。

trans-unit.source: Raises the forest functionality level to the given setting.
trans-unit.target: 將樹系功能等級提高至指定的設定。

trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.target: 取得樹系中所建立的第一個網域。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> 物件，表示在這個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 中建立的第一個網域。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.

trans-unit.target: 取得此樹系的名稱。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController" /> 物件，表示此 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 之 FSMO 結構描述主機的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object with which the inbound trust relationship exists.
trans-unit.target: 傳入信任關係存在的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件之 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if selective authentication is to be enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用選擇式驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables selective authentication for an inbound trust.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用連入信任的選擇性驗證。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the forest that is specified by <paramref name="targetForestName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 指定的樹系之間沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件已經處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object with which the trust relationship exists.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係存在的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件之 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用 SID 篩選，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.
trans-unit.target: 以指定樹系設定 SID 篩選狀態。

trans-unit.source: By default, new external and forest trusts in [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services enforce SID filtering.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，新的外部和樹系信任中[!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]Active Directory 網域服務會強制 SID 篩選。

trans-unit.source: SID filtering is used to prevent attacks from malicious users who might try to grant elevated user rights to another user account.
trans-unit.target: SID 篩選用來防止來自惡意使用者便可能會嘗試授與給其他使用者帳戶的提高權限的使用者權限攻擊。

trans-unit.source: Enforcing SID filtering on forest trusts does not prevent migrations to domains within the same forest from using SID history and will not affect your universal group access control strategy.
trans-unit.target: 強制執行樹系信任上的 SID 篩選不會阻止移轉到相同的樹系中使用 SID 歷程記錄，並不會影響您的萬用群組存取控制策略。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the forest that is specified by <paramref name="targetForestName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 指定的樹系之間沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件已經處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of sites that are contained in the forest.
trans-unit.target: 取得樹系中所包含的站台集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteCollection" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite" /> sites in the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteCollection" />，其中包含目前 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 站台。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current forest.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前樹系的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the DNS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Updates the password for the local side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 更新信任關係本機端的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object for which the local trust password is to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 要變更本機信任密碼的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件之名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new password for the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: Updates the password for the local side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 更新信任關係本機端的密碼。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the forest that is specified by <paramref name="targetForestName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 指定的樹系之間沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> or <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 或 <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> 是空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> or <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 或 <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object for which the local trust direction and password must be changed.
trans-unit.target: 必須變更本機信任方向和密碼的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件之名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value for the new trust direction for the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係之新信任方向的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The new password for the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: Updates the password and trust direction for the local side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 更新信任關係本機端的密碼和信任方向。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object that is specified by <paramref name="targetForestName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 指定的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件之間沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> or <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 或 <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> 是空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> or <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 或 <paramref name="newTrustPassword" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="newTrustDirection" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newTrustDirection" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object for which the trust directions must be changed.
trans-unit.target: 必須變更信任方向的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value that specifies the new trust direction for the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 指定信任關係之新信任方向的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Updates the trust direction for a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 更新信任關係的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: The trust directions are updated on both sides of the trust.
trans-unit.target: 信任的兩端都已更新信任方向。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the forest that is specified by <paramref name="targetForest" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForest" /> 指定的樹系之間沒有信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForest" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForest" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newTrustDirection" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newTrustDirection" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.
trans-unit.target: 存在信任之網域的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified forest is valid.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的樹系與先前建立的傳出信任為有效。

trans-unit.source: There is no outbound trust relationship with the forest that is specified by <paramref name="targetForestName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 指定的樹系之間沒有傳出信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForestName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> object for which to verify the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證信任關係的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value that specifies the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值，可指定相對於此樹系的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified forest is valid.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的樹系與先前建立的信任有效。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會驗證已完整建立信任關係。

trans-unit.source: The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立雙方的信任之前，不會建立信任。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the forest that is specified by <paramref name="targetForest" />, or the target forest does not have the trust direction that is specified by <paramref name="direction" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="targetForest" /> 指定的樹系之間沒有信任關係，或是目標樹系沒有 <paramref name="direction" /> 指定的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetForest" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetForest" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="direction" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="direction" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。
